long_description: this paradise combines florida's vibrant sunshine, culture, and stunning views. discover your dream apartment, a place where every day is a retreat. villa laguna introduces tranquil lagoon-side living with a miami twist, offering luxury amenities like a yoga studio, fitness center, and co-working spaces. its contemporary residences feature stunning views, chef-ready kitchens, and spacious interiors—a perfect balance of nature and urban convenience. two exquisite buildings feature top-tier finishes and innovative amenities in an energetic setting. it offers refined living spaces, exclusive beach cabanas, a top-notch fitness center, and extensive views, defining an unparalleled lifestyle in the solé mia community. situated between miami and fort lauderdale, solé mia rentals captivates with its blend of coastal vibrancy and luxury. solé mia offers luxury apartment homes with innovative amenities and an unbeatable location.
